name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HighlightX AI | GPT-4o, Gemini, Claude - Chat & Summarize YouTube & Webs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Chat anywhere, anytime, any questions, anything you need.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***Now HighlightX AI support GPT-4o Mini, GPT-4o Omni, Gemini Pro 1.5 & Claude 3.5 Sonnet***
**New in 2.5.4: 
-  add support more AI Provider like Groq, OpenRouter or any Provider support OpenAI API interface.
-  add support Local AI

**New in 2.0.0: 
- New UI 
- add new Subscription plan
- Improve response speed from AI.

**New in 1.1.4: 
- Add new Claude 3.5 Sonnet 
**
**New in 1.1.2: 
- Improve performance
- Displaying friendly error messages
- Troubleshoot guide for Ollama
**

**New in 1.1.1: 
- Now you can chat with AI Agents
- Create your own AI Agents
- More information in Model Menu
- Enhance Animation
**

HighlightX is a privacy-focused Chrome extension to let you use popular AI models such as GPT-4o Omni, Gemini 1.5 Flash or Claude to ask anything, write anything, summarize web content and Youtube video.

üëâ This plugin stores your data locally on your browser ensuring your privacy protected. We, the devs, have no way to access or collect your personal conversation data.

üëç Totally free to use, you will NOT be charged by queries or subscription. The premium version simply grant access to all extra features and is single-time purchase.

How to use?

1. Simply add HighlightX to Chrome then login with your Google account and start using.Key features.
2. Open AI Chat with Command + H or Click the icon below the bottom right in the web page

3.
‚úÖ You need API Key for using AI Models: 
- Can get one at 
+ https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

+ https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey

+ https://console.anthropic.com/account/keys

‚úÖ Choose your AI from popular providers: 

- OpenAI: GPT-4o Omni, GPT-3.5 Turbo, DALL-E 3

- Anthropic: Claude 3 Opus,  Claude 3 Sonnet, Claude 3 Haiku, Claude 2.1

- Google Gemini: Gemini Pro 1.5 Flash, Gemini Pro 1.5 Pro, Gemini Pro 1.0, Gemini Pro 1.0 Vision

- All Models that Ollama app supports like Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral,...


‚úÖ Chat in any language you want.

‚úÖ Change AI model to get different response in one chat thread.

‚úÖ Summarize web content, blog post, articles, and Youtube videos and anything on internet.

‚úÖ Generate images with DALLE-3 & DALL-E 2.

‚úÖ Chat with AI using your images.

‚úÖ Customize plugin UI the way you want: position, window size, text size, theme.

‚úÖ Use prompt library to store frequently used prompts.

‚úÖ Your data is stored locally.

‚úÖ We also support to chat with Local AI LLM by Ollama(https://ollama.com/library), which works with no internet and is absolutely private.We hope you enjoy HighlightX AI and if there's any question, please drop us an email on highlightx.ai@gmail.com

Our website: https://highlightx.ai/
